expect given the rhythms and paces of storytelling that there would be an equal and opposite thing that is so bad and they're gonna have to eke out a victory over it but the incredible league of un-gentlemenly exceptional extraordinary henry calvall war fighter gun world war two warrior fighters was just anti-climactic it was way too easy and maybe the first time somebody's reading through the book of acts you might be tempted to think that it's going to be like that you're just going to cruise to victory this is so easy jesus is there right at the beginning he says the holy spirits gonna show up and the holy spirit shows up and breaks the laws of time and space and a whole bunch of people immediately convert then right after that peter and john to the people are gonna be the linchpins and whether or not this thing works out they're afraid of anything john is very young peter is made big mistakes but doesn't matter there and face to they just go right back into the place but that's okay because this was all designed by god for the message of forgiveness and redemption and god's redemptive plan and the establishment of the kingdom of god to happen and they be he'll yet another showdown with the religious status quo and that's what happens over the next few chapters of the book of acts the religious leaders same people killed jesus they find out what peter and jesus thing it kind of seemed like they got away with it so who's to say maybe they'll do something more violent and see if rome puts a stop to it's they going to rest peter and john and they bring
